changeSet.author: tobias.friedrich@open-xchange.com
martin.schneider@open-xchange.com
changeSet.comment: Add table 'guest' to save known login addresses and associated groups (brandings) of guest users.
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE guest ( id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, gid VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, mail_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), INDEX (mail_address), UNIQUE (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

changeSet.author: martin.schneider@open-xchange.com
changeSet.comment: Add table 'guest2context' to save mappings from guests to context and users.
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE guest2context ( guest_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, cid INT4 UNSIGNED NOT NULL, uid INT4 UNSIGNED NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, passwordMech VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`guest_id`, `cid`,`uid`), FOREIGN KEY(`guest_id`) REFERENCES guest (`id`), INDEX(guest_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
